instruction: Describe the characteristics of the new smart television.
output: The new smart television has a number of characteristics that make it stand out from other televisions. It offers a modern design with thin, sleek bezels for a stylish look. It also has an intuitive interface with voice control and a variety of content options. The new smart TV supports multiple streaming services, such as Netflix and YouTube. It also has access to the Google Play Store and other apps. The TV is equipped with the latest technology, including 4K Ultra HD resolution and HDR10+.
